00028 void FollowSwarmCamera::update(const std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<WorldObject> > & markers,
00029                         const std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<Obstacle> >& obstacles,
00030                         const std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<RobotData> >& robot_datas){
00031 
00032     // Set new look at and camera position
00033     Vector3d center = Vector3d();
00034     float max_width = 0;
00035     float max_height = 0;
00036     float max_depth = 0;
00037 
00038     float width = 0.0;
00039     // Return from this function if we passed in bad data
00040 
00041     if(markers.size() + obstacles.size() + robot_datas.size() == 0){
00042         width = 2.0;
00043     }
00044 
00045 
00046 
00047     // Sum up all positions to get the center point of all objects
00048 
00049     center = Vector3d();
00050     int num_objects = 0;
00051 
00052     std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<WorldObject> >::const_iterator it_markers;
00053     for(it_markers = markers.begin(); it_markers < markers.end(); it_markers++){
00054         center += (*it_markers)->position();
00055         num_objects++;
00056 
00057     }
00058 
00059 
00060 
00061     std::vector< boost::shared_ptr<RobotData> >::const_iterator it_robot_data;
00062 
00063     for(it_robot_data = robot_datas.begin(); it_robot_data < robot_datas.end(); it_robot_data++){
00064         center += (*it_robot_data)->position();
00065         num_objects++;
00066     }
00067 
00068 
00069 
00070     // Divide the total by the number of objects to get the center point.
00071     // But check first if there were objects at all.
00072     if(num_objects > 0){
00073         center /= num_objects;
00074     }
00075 
00076 
00077 
00078 
00079     // Calculate the fartest distance to the center point.
00080     // Calculate the distance to the center point for all objects
00081     for(it_markers = markers.begin(); it_markers < markers.end(); it_markers++){
00082         float current_width  = fabsf(center(0) - (*it_markers)->position()(0));
00083         float current_height = fabsf(center(1) - (*it_markers)->position()(1));
00084         float current_depth  = fabsf(center(2) - (*it_markers)->position()(2));
00085 
00086 
00087 
00088         // Check if the current width value is greater than the max width stored.
00089         if(current_width  > max_width)  max_width  = current_width;
00090         // Check if the current height value is greater than the max height stored.
00091         if(current_height > max_height) max_height = current_height;
00092         // Check if the current depth value is greater than the max depth stored.
00093         if(current_depth > max_depth)   max_depth  = current_depth;
00094 
00095 
00096     }
00097 
00098 
00099     // Don't forget the robots
00100     for(it_robot_data = robot_datas.begin(); it_robot_data < robot_datas.end(); it_robot_data++){
00101         float current_width  = fabsf(center(0) - (*it_robot_data)->position()(0));
00102         float current_height = fabsf(center(1) - (*it_robot_data)->position()(1));
00103         float current_depth  = fabsf(center(2) - (*it_robot_data)->position()(2));
00104 
00105 
00106 
00107         // Check if the current width value is greater than the max width stored.
00108         if(current_width  > max_width)  max_width  = current_width;
00109         // Check if the current height value is greater than the max height stored.
00110         if(current_height > max_height) max_height = current_height;
00111         // Check if the current depth value is greater than the max depth stored.
00112         if(current_depth > max_depth)   max_depth  = current_depth;
00113     }
00114 
00115 
00116 
00117     // Check if the width is the highest value and assign that for the cube dimension
00118 
00119     if(max_width > max_height && max_width > max_depth){
00120 
00121         width = max_width;
00122 
00123     // Check if the height is the heighest value and assign that for the cube dimension
00124     }else if(max_height > max_width && max_height > max_depth) {
00125 
00126         width = max_height;
00127 
00128     // Else it must be the depth or it's the same value as some of the other ones
00129     } else {
00130 
00131         width = max_depth;
00132     }
00133 
00134 
00135     this->view_(0) = center(0);
00136     view_(1) = center(1);
00137     view_(2) = center(2);
00138 
00139 
00140     position_(0) = center(0) + width;
00141     position_(1) = center(0) + width * 3.25;
00142     position_(2) = center(0) + width* 2.25;
00143 
00144 
00145 }
